title: Virtual Assistant – Marketing Support (Influencer Outreach,  Admin, Customer Support)
job_overview:
Part-Time Virtual Assistant (Customer Support, Influencer Outreach & Admin)

About INÉ:
INÉ is a skincare startup inspired by Japanese beauty rituals and powered by sake kasu—the original fermented rice behind the rice water and kojic Upgrade to see actual info. We create minimalist, effective skincare rooted in nature and tradition.

We’re looking for a proactive, detail-oriented Virtual Assistant to support our Marketing Lead with influencer outreach, customer support, and day-to-day admin. If you’re efficient, resourceful, and a fast learner, we’d love to work with you. Hours and pay can grow with strong performance.

?

Your Role at INÉ

Influencer Outreach
	•	Identify and reach out to nano/micro influencers who align with our brand
	•	Draft outreach emails and DMs that feel personal and on-brand
	•	Track outreach, replies, shipping info, and content delivery
	•	Coordinate gifting campaigns and ensure timely follow-ups
	•	Organize and label UGC for reuse across marketing channels
	•	Research trends and recommend new influencer partnerships
	•	Create monthly reports on outreach performance and test new strategies to improve results

Customer & Admin Support
	•	Respond to customer emails and DMs in a warm, brand-aligned tone
	•	Help schedule content across socials, email, and blog
	•	Maintain and organize influencer and content databases
	•	Draft outreach emails for media and partnership opportunities
	•	Help track KPIs and streamline reporting
	•	Assist with light project management and ongoing admin support

?

What We’re Looking For
You are someone who:
	•	Speaks and writes fluent, natural English
	•	Has a sharp eye for eliminating AI-sounding or generic language
	•	Is organized and reliable with excellent attention to detail
	•	Learns and adapts quickly from feedback
	•	Makes sound decisions and knows when to ask questions
	•	Has clear, professional writing skills
	•	Has experience with influencer outreach and/or customer support
	•	Understands how to automate or streamline workflows (a plus!)

?

How to Apply
Send us a short message highlighting your experience with:
	•	Influencer outreach or social media
	•	Customer support or admin
	•	Any tools or systems you’re confident using

We’re excited to hear from you!
